ruling: - Fusion Monsters Special Summoned without [[Polymerization]] while [[Fusion Gate]] is on the field are still considered properly Summoned by a Fusion Summon. So they may be the target of [[Monster Reborn]], [[Call of the Haunted]], etc. (This does not apply to Fusion Monsters Special Summoned by the effects of other cards, such as [[Magical Scientist]] or [[Summoner of Illusions]].)
